manifest.name: 한국어
manifest.author: PeerProject Development Team
manifest.prompt: 여기를 클릭하여 자연 언어는 한국을 선택합니다.

string.value: This is a pre-release version of PeerProject, and the beta testing period has ended. Please download the full, official release from http://PeerProject.org/.
Handshake failed, host may not support chatting.
You have not yet filled in your user profile. You must provide a profile before you can chat with other users.\n\nWould you like to fill in your profile now?
Cannot send message, you are not connected. PeerProject is trying to connect...
Cannot send message, a connection has not been established yet.
Private conversation granted, you are now chatting with %s.
%s is not accepting private conversations, sorry.
Requesting a firewalled push connection from %s...
Connection failed due to invalid data on the wire.
This template does not have any customizations.
Please respect others while using this service. Press Connect below to start.
Welcome to the PeerProject IRC Chatrooms
PeerProject was unable to install the collection file "%s" by copying it to the folder "%s".
Would you like to download all files in this collection?\n\nChoose Cancel to stop any further prompts.
PeerProject has added the collection file "%s" to your library.

PeerProject received a collection file:

"%s".

This file does not appear to be a valid collection file.
Would you like to prevent this collection from prompting you to download anything else?
Are you sure you want to launch the file "%s" ?\n\nSome files can be harmful to your computer. Ensure you know what the file is before launching it.
Are you sure you want to delete the %i selected album folders ?\n\nNote that this action does not delete the files within the album folders, only the folders themselves.
PeerProject could not delete the file:\n\n%s

Your downloaded files folder "%s" is not yet in your library.

Including your downloaded files folder in your library makes it easier to view and organise new downloads, and lets you take advantage of advanced PeerProject features such as download verification and automatic upgrading. Placing downloaded files in your library does not necessarily require you to share them: you can choose whether or not to share files independently.

Would you like to add your downloaded files folder to your library now?
Your downloads folder has been added to your library. Would you like to share it too?
You are about to modify the metadata of %i files, are you sure you want to continue?
Unable to move the file %s. The file may be in use by another application.\n\nDo you wish to try to copy this file instead?

Target file exists:

%s

Would you like to overwrite it?
The file "%s" failed a hash verification test, and might not be the file you intended to download. Are you sure you want to open it?
Would you like to remove the "potentially unsafe" attribute from this file?
The file "%s" has not yet been hashed. Please wait for the file to be hashed, and then try again.

This option uses services provided by Bitzi.com for recognising and sharing information about selected files.

PeerProject will transmit the SHA1 hash code for the selected file(s) in order to query the Bitzi database. If you are concerned about privacy, you may wish to consult the Bitzi.com privacy policy.

Would you like to proceed?
A subfolder of the selected folder "%s" is already part of your library.nAdding this folder will cause re-hashing of some files.\n\nDo you want to continue ?
아니 파일을 재생합니다. 미디어를 클릭하여 라이브러리에서 파일을 재생할 수있습니다.

All Media Files|*.asx;*.wax;*.m3u;*.wvx;*.wmx;*.asf;*.wav;*.snd;*.au;*.aif;*.aifc;*.aiff;*.wma;*.rm;*.mp3;*.ogg;*.ogm;*.cda;*.mid;*.rmi;*.midi;*.avi;*.asf;*.mpeg;*.mpg;*.m1v;*.mp2;*.mpa;*.mpe;*.wmv|Playlists|*.asx;*.wax;*.m3u;*.wvx;*.wmx|Audio Files|*.asf;*.wav;*.snd;*.au;*.aif;*.aifc;*.aiff;*.wma;*.rm;*.mp3;*.ogg;*.ogm|Video Files|*.avi;*.asf;*.mpeg;*.mpg;*.m1v;*.mp2;*.mpa;*.mpe;*.wmv|CD Audio Tracks|*.cda|MIDI Files|*.mid;*.rmi;*.midi|All Files|*.*||
The file may be damaged, or you may not have the necessary codecs to play it.
Part of this file could not be played, you may need to download additional codecs.
PeerProject could not instantiate its MediaServices plugin. Please reinstall PeerProject, and confirm that you have the necessary media codecs and output drivers installed.
P E E R P R O J E C T M E D I A S Y S T E M

You haven't entered your location in your user profile.

It's a good idea to enter your location so that other users can see which country you are from. Note that entering a location does not reveal any compromising information.

Are you sure you want to continue without entering your location?
You haven't entered a screen name in your user profile.
You have not selected your age and gender. Are you sure you want to continue without doing this?
You are about to start a new search. Would you like to clear the results of your previous search?
이 영역은 선택한 파일에 대한 자세한 정보를 보여줍니다.
Unable to download preview content from "%s".
네트워크 어떠한 아직 경기를 반환하지 않았습니다.
%lu file in %lu hit|%lu file in %lu hits|%lu files in %lu hits
The complete and incomplete folders should not be the same
Windows doesn't support paths longer than 256 characters.\nPlease select a folder with a shorter path.
The incomplete files folder should not be in the library, as it would reduce performance. Incomplete files may be shared directly from the transfers window.
Please type the bandwidth limit you wish to set in the form "123 kb/s" for kilobits per second, or "123 KB/s" for kilobytes per second.

The eDonkey network uses large queues with long wait times. By limiting the maximum queue position you will accept so strictly, you may have trouble getting downloads to begin.nAre you sure you want to limit what queue positions you will accept?
Unable to accept connections, URL unavailable.
Are you sure you want to delete the "%s" skin? This cannot be undone.
Hub mode with %lu neighbours. %s 개 지역 도서관에.
Hub/Ultrapeer mode with %lu neighbours. %s 개 지역 도서관에.
Ultrapeer mode with %lu neighbours. %s 개 지역 도서관에.
!에 오신 것을 환영합니다 {version}\n\nPeerProject is completely free software, please use it responsibly.
There are no active searches. Click here to search for files.
You're not connected. Click the Connect button to get started.
Are you sure you want to delete the "%s" template?nThis cannot be undone.
This file appears to be spam.
You have downloaded and deleted this file before.
You already have this file on your download list.
You already have this file in your library.
Sources for this file are currently busy
Sources for this file are firewalled
Sources for this file may be unstable
PeerProject has finished downloading the next PeerProject version (%s). Would you like to upgrade now?\n\nIf you select Yes, PeerProject will close temporarily while the upgrade is installed.
Offline queued upload host %s expired, removing.
Timed out waiting for request from upload host %s.
Closing upload connection %s due to lack of traffic.
Unable to parse URL: PeerProject does not understand this URL.
에 오신 것을 환영합니다 PeerProject (피어 프로젝트).

control.caption: Show a prompt before opening URIs
Switch to Transfers view on download
Hide side bar when starting search
Ask Me|Minimize to Tray|Exit Immediately|Exit After Transfers
Use PeerProject Media Player to PLAY the file types listed below
Use PeerProject Media Player to ENQUEUE the file types listed below
Note: Choosing an external Media Handler will disable Media/Visualization Plugins.
You can use your Gnutella User Profile to share information about yourself, your interests and recommended files and websites with others.
Enable peer to peer chat with compatible clients
Enable chat on all protocols where possible
Use PeerProject to open these types of links:
Use PeerProject to manage all my web downloads:
The download manager plugin will only attempt to download file types listed here. Other file types will be handled by your web browser. PeerProject must be running to manage downloads.
Only download and upload to networks which are connected.

PeerProject Remote Access allows you to leave PeerProject running on your PC, and control it remotely using a web browser. You will need to be able to accept incoming connections to use this feature. (Ensure port-forwarding.)
If you haven't used PeerProject or another P2P client before, this QuickStart wizard can help you configure your copy in a few simple steps.
If you're a more advanced user, you can access the full range of PeerProject's options via the Tools menu. Click Exit to close the wizard at any time.
This wizard will assist you to:
Tell PeerProject about your Internet connection
Connect to your choice of P2P networks, and
For best performance, PeerProject needs to know your internet connection.
You may select the Internet connection type:

PeerProject is a general purpose filesharing application that can swarm multiple P2P networks on a single download, therefore all are recommended. Note you can always manage specific networks at any time.
The Gnutella2 network (G2) is PeerProject's premiere network, offering more features and performance than any other P2P net. (Shareaza)
The original Gnutella network (G1) is less feature-rich than G2, with more unwanted spam, yet remains a valuable resource. (LimeWire)
The eDonkey network (ED2K) is a popular server-based network. While not as feature-rich or fast as G2, ED2K has a vast file collection. (eMule)
Associate .Torrent Files (Handle BitTorrent links by default)
PeerProject 첫번째 다운로드 부분적 개인 폴더로 파일을 다운로드 다음 그룹에 따라 완료되면 그들을 이동합니다.
일반적인 파일 형식이 있지만, 하위 폴더에 처음 설치 아르 그룹은 사용자 정의할 수 있습니다. 간단히 Drag'n'drop 파일.
P2P networks are only as good as the people who use them. All of the content available for download is being shared by another user.
You do not have to share content to use PeerProject, however some software will behave differently to users who are not sharing anything.
Please indicate which folders, if any, you wish to share. Simply click the Add button to add a new folder.
주의 : 업로드 승인되지 않은 저작권 작품이 일부 국가에서 책임을집니다.
PeerProject supports a flexible user interface, so you can choose what is most comfortable for you. You can change these options at any time.
Simple, easy to use menus with fewer options.{n}Helpful for new users of file sharing.
Normal mode offers users all extra commands, windows, etc.{n}Might be more confusing for new users.
Display simplified download progress bars. (May be less confusing)
Try mixing multiple skins to further add/remove capabilities.
PeerProject is a much friendlier place when everyone writes a few basic details about themselves.
That's it. PeerProject has been configured to work with your computer.
If you ever need to change your settings, you can re-run this QuickStart wizard by selecting it from the Tools menu or Home tab.
After closing this wizard, try running a fake search to Ban the spammers. Explore toolbar tabs while waiting.
Start PeerProject every time Windows starts
Connect to the network every time I start PeerProject
PeerProject has detected that you have another eDonkey program installed on your computer. Would you like to import any unfinished downloads into PeerProject?
This profile is available to users who browse your files, primarily on the G2 network.{n}(PeerProject or Shareaza)
Allow others to browse my user profile
Initiate a new connection to host or server:|Browse this host:|Message this user:
New files can be downloaded directly from Web and P2P links. Simply copy/paste the URL or URI link for the file into the box below. (http:, ftp:, ed2k:, magnet:, etc.)
A small .torrent file is needed to begin BitTorrent downloads. Paste the .torrent's direct link above, or select a local .torrent file. (Use drag'n'drop any time.)
You have selected %i files to copy to the following folder:
You have selected %i files to move to the following folder:
Add this information to all files in the folder
Select a schema from the list, then select the fields to display as columns.

This is a list of folders in your library. You can add and remove folders using the buttons on the left. When you add a new folder it is initially shared with other users, however you can unshare it from the PeerProject library if you wish.
You can copy a URI for the selected item in a variety of different formats. Please choose the format you wish to use by clicking one of the URIs below:
Include myself as a fixed source in the URL
You have selected %lu files to export as PeerProject-powered URI references. Please select the format for the URIs, and click Save:
Tiger Root|SHA1|MD5|ED2K (CMD4)|BitTorrent|Filename|Filename (URI)|Base Filename|File Extension|File Size|File Size (bytes)|Folder Path|Local Host|Local Port|Link|Link (URI)
You have clicked a PeerProject-powered URI that links to this content on the network:
You have clicked a PeerProject-powered URL that will connect you to this host or server:
You have clicked a PeerProject-powered URI that will allow you to browse the shared files available on the following host:
You have clicked a PeerProject-powered URI that will add this Discovery Service to your Discovery Services cache.
Select the action you would like to take:
PeerProject is attempting to download metadata from Bitzi...
PeerProject is creating a preview of the download:
(Copying downloaded chunks to a new preview file)
Did you know PeerProject is 100% free software?

PeerProject does not contain any spyware, adware or bundled software;{n}it does not display any advertisements, popups, or other bad behavior.{n}{n}If you ever see such activity be assured that it is not coming from this program.

PeerProject is proud to be Free and Open-Source Software. A non-profit team of passionate volunteers shares this product with all the freedoms of GPL and Creative Commons Licenses, in the hope that it might be useful.
You must not have paid any money to obtain this program. PeerProject can be freely downloaded from PeerProject.org, if you've paid anyone for this demand a full refund immediately.
PeerProject respects and appreciates its users.
Hope you've enjoyed using PeerProject so far, it strives to be the best true file sharing software available.
Unfortunately, a lot of potential filesharers don't know what they're missing.
If you know someone who might like PeerProject, whether a new user or still using older software, let them know there is a better alternative. And Thanks.
{This is the last welcome message you will see.}
You already have this file in your file library. What would you like to do?
Show me the file in my library
You have downloaded and deleted this file before. What would you like to do?

Warning! Duplicate files detected. Some malicious software may infect your Library. Make sure that you downloaded this file or placed it manually. Otherwise, shutdown PeerProject and scan your computer with an antivirus program.
This is the first time you have clicked PeerProject's close button. Please choose what action you would like PeerProject to take when clicking the close button from now on:
Shut down PeerProject after any downloads and uploads finish
You can download a file from the web to refresh your local list of servers.\nSuch as eDonkey server.met, DC++ hublist.xml.bz2, etc.
PeerProject can remember files to warn you and others in the future. A new 'ghost file' will save your comments and rating with file info.

Just deleting, keep any current comments|File is very low quality or outdated|File is named incorrectly or misleading|File is fake, infected, corrupt, or unusable|File is restricted copyright material|File needs custom comments below...
This feature is used to export the contents of a folder or playlist as a rich collection file. Please select a template and press Next to continue.|Customize your collection by entering data below.
You have opened a BitTorrent torrent file. Would you like to download its contents, or re-seed it?
To share complete files using BitTorrent they must first be seeded. Once this process is complete the Torrent will appear as a new item in your download list.
As needed| When ratio over 100%| Only when requested| Never
주의: This dialog provides advanced download editing features for power users, that may cause corruption when used incorrectly.
주의: This dialog provides advanced download editing features for power users, that may cause corruption when used incorrectly.
Forget current verification status and reverify
Assume file is 100% complete and reverify
Merge with local file and verify
취소 Cancel download but save incomplete files
Select an audio visualisation from the list:
Footer Display|Full Size Display|Large Display|Medium Display|Small Display
A new version of PeerProject is now available. Would you like to upgrade?
To update now, the upgrade installer will simply be added to your download queue.
Please select the method of re-encoding:
Add a channel name:|Enter kick/ban reason:
